alert.note: Alert for McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 30 at 6:33PM CDT until March 30 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN UNION...SOUTHEASTERN TIPPAH...PRENTISS...ALCORN AND MCNAIRY COUNTIES... At 633 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Selmer to Pratts Friendship, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Corinth, Booneville, Selmer, Baldwyn, Big Hill Pond State Park, Adamsville, Jumpertown, Glen, Thrashers, Theo, Hinkle, Wheeler, Leedy, Farmington, Bethel Springs, Eastview, Michie, Dumas, Guys and Ramer. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for northeastern Mississippi...and western Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
